title: Iris Flower Classification
statement:
Build a machine learning model to classify iris flowers based on sepal and petal measurements. Use the provided dataset to train your model and predict the species of new flowers.

Dataset: iris.csv with columns: sepal_length, sepal_width, petal_length, petal_width, species

Requirements:
1. Load and explore the data
2. Preprocess the data (if needed)
3. Train a classification model
4. Evaluate model performance
5. Make predictions on test data

Libraries available: scikit-learn, pandas, numpy, matplotlib
